description: This file defines service functions for fetching dashboard statistics and cash flow data, including mock data fallback, using Supabase client for database interactions.

methods.name: getDashboardStats
methods.description: Fetches dashboard statistics including income, expenses, profit, and recent transactions, with mock data fallback if user is not authenticated.

methods.name: getCashFlowData
methods.description: Returns mock cash flow data aggregated by month.
